review: When you have so many options on a new TV, what would there be a need for this device?  Pretty slow and buffering is not great when hooked up to the wireless router.  Netflix had to be reinstalled. Just easier to watch Netflix on my computer and copy a movie to a usb or put it in a DVD or Bluray player.  This device would be ideal for the person that just has an moblie phone or tablet without a computer.
